message:
SYSTEM: Helio-no_animations.pdf: Página 22
Set your title here in Slide Master Options
Conclusions
22
▪Helio
o Allows the generation of RDF form heterogeneus datas 
sources
o Allows the iteraction with those sources by genrating 
heterogeneus data from RDF
o Enables a Linked Data Service for third-party systems to 
interact with the heterogeneuos data sources
▪Extensibility
o By implementing an interface (Conector, Datasource, 
Translator or Function) from the core project
o By implementing plugins
▪Scope
o Has been tested in two European projects (VICINITY & 
DELTA)
o Has been used, and extended in 3 master thesis
o Has received colaboration from external users
speaker: SYSTEM
